author: rappoccio
body: This adds some value maps that are not currently used in any production. They compute the beta-star variables used by the L1 jet correction team. This is intended for NANOAOD (either standard, or the upcoming JME workflow).
title: Adding some beta-star variables for JEC workflows. Intended for NANOAOD. Backport of #25223 to 10.2.x
